ThingDef.label: Wolfein Square Glasses
ThingDef.description: Classical design,making you looked like an expert, for sure.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Safety Helmet
ThingDef.description: The most basic protective gear, designed to safeguard the wearer’s head from falling rocks and flying debris (Excluding the ears!).

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Newsboy Cap
ThingDef.description: Loose, breathable, and durable, so it becomes one of the outdoor workers equipments choice.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Beret
ThingDef.description: A lightweight, brimless soft cap known for its simple design, commonly seen in military use and everyday fashion.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Head Bandage
ThingDef.description: Quite useful when you want to cosplay a mummy, and a bit useful when you try to hind your wound or scar.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Gaz Mask
ThingDef.description: Covering your sensitive nose and mouth, protected them from toxic gas. The LED on the head strap could remind the user to change the fitter.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Military Helmet
ThingDef.description: Wolfein Army's standard helmet with gaz mask and thermal goggle, with these extra high technology equipments, the Wolfein soldiers' combat effectiveness is much higher than other races.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Psionic Combat Helmet
ThingDef.description: Specially designed helmet, could improve soliders' Psionic power while protecting your head and ears.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Shooter Cap
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein Army's snipers' favorite hat since 100 years ago. Comfortable, light, even have a tactical earphone that makes you very coooooool.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Thermal Goggle
ThingDef.description: Although the Wolfein possess exceptional night vision, this equipment can ensure their enemy having no where to hind in the dark.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Red Combat Helmet
ThingDef.description: A helmet designed to complement the Red combat suit, equipped with tactical interfaces for operations in high-risk environments. Its red coating symbolizes a special operations unit.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Power Armor Helmet
ThingDef.description: Basic model of Wolfein's powered armor,widely used by Wolfein Task Mobile Forces.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Heavy Power Armor Helmet
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein heavy power armor helmet, once worn only by those who fought in the most brutal battles against the Mechanoid.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Combat Unit Exciter
ThingDef.description: Enhances the wearer's shooting accuracy through electrical stimulation of the cerebral cortex while suppressing pain nerves, enabling better contributions to the MegaCorp's expansion efforts.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein AIPT Gunlink
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein AIPT gunlink, equipped with a ballistic computer that utilizes the latest and most advanced algorithms from MegaCorp to assist the user in achieving the highest precision shots.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein AIPTGoggle
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein AIPT goggles, equipped with a simple cognitive protection program, help the wearer remain calm when facing anomalies, prioritizing the interests of the company.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein AIPT Heavy Power Armor Helmet
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein AIPT heavy helmet, compared to the version worn by task force colleagues, places greater emphasis on fire protection to prevent the wearer from descending into hell along with the enemy.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Rebel Heavy Power Armor Helmet
ThingDef.description: A helmet for the heavy power armor used by the Wolfein Resistance. The manufacturing cost is reduced, but the protection is also reduced.

ThingDef.label: Wolfein Imperial Power Armor Mask
ThingDef.description: The Wolfein tribe retained the royal-style power armor protective masks of the old times, and the eye protection part was equipped with components for stimulating brain nerves to assist in combat.
